name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in cloud-native system deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, with expertise in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **Azure DevOps**. Proficient in scripting with **Bash** and **PowerShell**, managing databases with **SQL**, and leveraging Azure services like **Service Bus**, **Azure App Services**, and **Azure Storage**. Skilled in implementing **CI/CD pipelines**, ensuring seamless software integration and delivery. 

Additionally, adept in using **GitHub** for version control and maintaining Agile development practices. Strong background in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries, with thorough knowledge of compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and managing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
